faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions

visaApplication.question: How do I apply for a Thai visa?
visaApplication.answer: Use our AI-powered visa application system. Simply go to "Apply for Visa", select your visa type, and follow the step-by-step process. Our AI will guide you through document requirements and eligibility checks.

creditSystem.question: How does the credit system work?
creditSystem.answer: Credits are consumed for each AI service you use. Different actions have different credit costs. You can purchase credit packages from our pricing page. Credits never expire and can be used across all services.

documents.question: What documents do I need for visa application?
documents.answer: Required documents vary by visa type, but typically include passport, photos, bank statements, flight bookings, and accommodation proof. Our AI will provide a personalized checklist based on your application.

aiAccuracy.question: How accurate is the AI document analysis?
aiAccuracy.answer: Our AI has a 98% accuracy rate in document verification and analysis. It can detect common issues, verify authenticity, and provide recommendations for improving your application success rate.

refunds.question: Can I get a refund for unused credits?
refunds.answer: Credits are non-refundable once purchased, but they never expire. You can use them for any of our AI services including visa applications, document checking, and trip planning.

processing.question: How long does visa processing take?
processing.answer: Processing times vary by visa type and embassy. Our AI provides estimated processing times and can help you track your application status. Typical processing is 3-15 business days.
